definition: lowering and raising of the head/(fig.) small move/pitch (position angle)
to face upward/to look up/to admire/to rely on

sentences.english: The rotating sphere shows the current pitch and bank angles.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉的球體表示了當前的俯仰角和坡度角。

sentences.english: The S-IVB stage has its single engine gimbaled in pitch and yaw.
sentences.chinese: IVB級有一個單獨擺動發動機來作俯仰和偏航。

sentences.english: It is caught in oscillations of overcompensation.
sentences.chinese: 受矯枉過正的影響，機身陷入俯仰震盪。

sentences.english: Elevators on the tailplane control pitch.
sentences.chinese: 平尾上的升降舵控制俯仰。

sentences.english: The moveable horizontal surface of the empennage used for pitch trim.
sentences.chinese: 飛機尾翼的可動水平面，用來控制俯仰配平。

sentences.english: Life, pitch between, pursuit of excellence, but have hereunder to do the best possible.
sentences.chinese: 人生在世，俯仰之間，自當追求卓越，但有盡其所能。

sentences.english: It changes working radius usually by luffing jib.
sentences.chinese: 通常多采用俯仰臂架的方法來實現工作幅度的改變。

sentences.english: The first type is available when the pitch angle is small.
sentences.chinese: 當俯仰角很微小的時候，使用第一種方式較爲方便。
見其伸頸俯仰，吐出黃金半鋌。

sentences.english: In this paper, effects of horizontal tail volume coefficient on the pitch agility metrics are discussed through comparison computations.
sentences.chinese: 研究了平尾尾容係數對飛機俯仰敏捷性尺度的影響。

definition: coming together and separating/aggregation and dissipation
appearing and disappearing/dimly visible/intermittent/implicit (but not clearly present)
to lean on sth and gaze into the distance
to look forward and back cautiously
to turn one's head and look around
to change one's viewpoint/to turn from side to side (in bed)
